thread.title: Oriflame quarter two operating profit above forecast
thread.title_full: Oriflame quarter two operating profit above forecast

title: Oriflame quarter two operating profit above forecast
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 13, 2015, 06:39 BST - UK Markets open in 1 hr 21 mins Oriflame quarter two operating profit above forecast Reuters – 9 minutes ago Price Change 
STOCKHOLM (Reuters) - Swedish cosmetics maker Oriflame (ORIFL.ST) reported second quarter earnings above expectations on Thursday and said sales in the third quarter so far had risen 4 percent. 
Oriflame's operating profit (EBITDA) fell to 29.6 million euros ($33.0 million) from 32.8 million a year ago, topping a mean forecast of 28.7 million in a Reuters poll of analysts. 
(Reporting by Helena Soderpalm; Editing by Simon Johnson) Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
